sentences.en: Compost provides congenial conditions for roots to develop.
sentences.cn: 堆肥为根部的生长提供了适宜的条件。

sentences.en: Finding this stranger congenial, he volunteered all sorts of information about the countryside.
sentences.cn: 他知道的乡下问题可多咧. 于是他说到地名“栗坳”的新闻.

sentences.en: For many students, this is a congenial arrangement.
sentences.cn: 对于很多学生来说, 这是一种适宜的安排.

sentences.en: Frank was a very congenial colleague.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克是一位很好相处的同事。

sentences.en: He found congenial officers who knew how to leaven war's rigours with riotous enjoyment.
sentences.cn: 他找到了懂得用狂欢来冲淡战争的严酷的志趣相投的军官。

sentences.en: He found very little congenial companionship in this casual Western city.
sentences.cn: 他在这个变化莫测的西部城市很少能找到意气相投的友情.

sentences.en: He is back in more congenial company.
sentences.cn: 他回来后变得更容易相处了。

sentences.en: He seems to find me congenial.
sentences.cn: 他好像发现我挺讨人喜欢似的.

sentences.en: He thought that was a congenial job.
sentences.cn: 他觉得那是个合意的差事.
我发现他跟人很合得来.

sentences.en: I met few people congenial to me in the department.
sentences.cn: 在那个单位里我没碰到几个意气相投的人.

sentences.en: In this small village he found few persons congenial to him.
sentences.cn: 在这个小村子里他发现很少有人与他志趣相投.

sentences.en: Mac, as the President called him, was the valet , a handsome and congenial man.
sentences.cn: (总统称呼他为麦克)麦克是个既漂亮又和善的男仆.

sentences.en: She and he were congenial companion in youth.
sentences.cn: 他和她是竹马青梅,志趣相投.

sentences.en: Some psychiatrists have patients who grow almost alarmed at how congenial they suddenly feel.
sentences.cn: 有些精神分析学家发现,他们的某些病人在突然感到惬意的时候几乎会兴奋起来.

sentences.en: The atmosphere of the meeting ways by no means so congenial as in former days.
sentences.cn: 这次会议上的气氛一点儿也不像往日开会时那么融洽.

words.tran_cn: 同性质；适意；意气相投；同精神

trans.tran_cn: 意气相投的，性格相似的，适意的，投缘
